name: Alto Tech Co., Ltd.
description: Operator of an energy management platform intended to help hotel and building owners to manage their energy consumption. The company's platform helps to reduce the use of energy by automatically adjusting the temperature, mode, and operation of the air conditioning system and also helps in collecting electricity usage data for analysis and processing, enabling hotels to save money on their electricity bills, be more energy efficient, and at the end disrupt the hospitality and energy sectors with artificial intelligence.
one_liner: Operator of an energy management platform intended to help hotel and building owners to manage their energy consumption. The company's platform helps to reduce the use of energy by automatically adjusting the temperature, mode, and operation of the air conditioning system and also helps in collecting electricity usage data for analysis and processing, enabling hotels to save money on their electricity bills, be more energy efficient, and at the end disrupt the hospitality and energy sectors with artificial intelligence.

name: American Aerospace Technologies, Inc.
description: Provider of manned and unmanned aerial services focused on the oil and gas industry. The company operates aircraft at high altitudes and has a first-mover use case along with offering advanced payloads, flight systems and flight services for near-real-time (NRT) infrastructure patrol, emergency response and mapping thereby, assisting customers with large-scale airspace development and establishing government policies, procedures and practices.
one_liner: Provider of manned and unmanned aerial services focused on the oil and gas industry. The company operates aircraft at high altitudes and has a first-mover use case along with offering advanced payloads, flight systems and flight services for near-real-time (NRT) infrastructure patrol, emergency response and mapping thereby, assisting customers with large-scale airspace development and establishing government policies, procedures and practices.

name: In Charge One, Inc.
description: Developer of EV charging infrastructure intended to provide an alternative energy source. The company is currently operating in stealth mode.
one_liner: Developer of EV charging infrastructure intended to provide an alternative energy source. The company is currently operating in stealth mode.

name: Ingu Solutions, Inc.
description: Manufacturer of pipers technology system intended for efficient and economical pipeline inspection solutions. The company combines inline leak detection, deposit surveys, and wall condition monitoring technology to provide full insight into all pipeline assets under all conditions, helping clients to make well-informed decisions to keep their pipelines safe and efficient.
one_liner: Manufacturer of pipers technology system intended for efficient and economical pipeline inspection solutions. The company combines inline leak detection, deposit surveys, and wall condition monitoring technology to provide full insight into all pipeline assets under all conditions, helping clients to make well-informed decisions to keep their pipelines safe and efficient.

name: Krosslinker Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a thermal insulation material designed to tackle the demanding challenges of cold-chain bio-pharmaceutical packaging. The company's material offers enhanced insulation performance, durability, and moisture resistance, and is eco-friendly, enabling clients to have a safe handling of bio-pharma products.
one_liner: Developer of a thermal insulation material designed to tackle the demanding challenges of cold-chain bio-pharmaceutical packaging. The company's material offers enhanced insulation performance, durability, and moisture resistance, and is eco-friendly, enabling clients to have a safe handling of bio-pharma products.

name: Meshcrafts AS
description: Developer of an EV charging platform intended to offer an open marketplace for electric vehicle charging.
one_liner: Developer of an EV charging platform intended to offer an open marketplace for electric vehicle charging.

name: PurismEV Inc.
description: Operator of an AI energy efficiency company intended to improve motor and battery efficiency based on driving patterns. The company offers various services such as reducing environmental impact, increasing vehicle lifetime, reducing battery size, improving range performance, increasing energy efficiency, and improving acceleration, providing users with real-time vehicle monitoring.
one_liner: Operator of an AI energy efficiency company intended to improve motor and battery efficiency based on driving patterns. The company offers various services such as reducing environmental impact, increasing vehicle lifetime, reducing battery size, improving range performance, increasing energy efficiency, and improving acceleration, providing users with real-time vehicle monitoring.

name: GridCure Inc.
description: Developer of an algorithmic system intended to optimize the entire electric mobility ecosystem. The company's algorithmic optimization system (AOS) platform uses advanced machine learning and data analytics to optimize grid performance, considering fleet owner operational requirements, existing utility tariffs and rates, electric utility infrastructure capacity and grid constraints, wholesale energy market pricing, and more, enabling clients the transition to a decarbonized power grid based on distributed energy resources as primary service providers.
one_liner: Developer of an algorithmic system intended to optimize the entire electric mobility ecosystem. The company's algorithmic optimization system (AOS) platform uses advanced machine learning and data analytics to optimize grid performance, considering fleet owner operational requirements, existing utility tariffs and rates, electric utility infrastructure capacity and grid constraints, wholesale energy market pricing, and more, enabling clients the transition to a decarbonized power grid based on distributed energy resources as primary service providers.

name: Rovilus, Inc.
description: Developer of battery technologies designed to accelerate the adoption of clean energy. The company's technologies develop products that use thermal management technology to provide batteries made of fire-suppression material and have an extended lifetime, enabling companies to increase their operational efficiency and reduce their total cost of operation.
one_liner: Developer of battery technologies designed to accelerate the adoption of clean energy. The company's technologies develop products that use thermal management technology to provide batteries made of fire-suppression material and have an extended lifetime, enabling companies to increase their operational efficiency and reduce their total cost of operation.

name: SOLS Energy Sdn Bhd.
description: Provider of solar energy products and services intended to promote the use of green energy. The company offers grid-tied, off-grid, and hybrid solar thermal and water pump systems that facilitate reducing carbon dioxide emissions, enabling customers to get cost-effective access to clean energy.
one_liner: Provider of solar energy products and services intended to promote the use of green energy. The company offers grid-tied, off-grid, and hybrid solar thermal and water pump systems that facilitate reducing carbon dioxide emissions, enabling customers to get cost-effective access to clean energy.

name: Electronic Grid Systems Inc.
description: Developer of an EV charging technology designed to tackle the electrical grid infrastructure problems. The company's technology helps to build a future with a clean and low-cost energy system that seamlessly integrates renewable energy sources, energy storage, and zero-emission vehicles, enabling clients to deploy EV charging stations with minimized cost and effort.
one_liner: Developer of an EV charging technology designed to tackle the electrical grid infrastructure problems. The company's technology helps to build a future with a clean and low-cost energy system that seamlessly integrates renewable energy sources, energy storage, and zero-emission vehicles, enabling clients to deploy EV charging stations with minimized cost and effort.

name: Volt14 Solutions Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of an anode manufacturing company intended to develop ultra-high performance materials for Li-ion batteries. The company's products are built using a wet chemistry approach and mainly include lithium anodes which can be used in any Li-ion battery for 3C applications, automobiles and systems, or defense and space, enabling energy industry manufacturers to use their existing product line of applications with these alternative battery anodes, without any manufacturing bottlenecks.
one_liner: Operator of an anode manufacturing company intended to develop ultra-high performance materials for Li-ion batteries. The company's products are built using a wet chemistry approach and mainly include lithium anodes which can be used in any Li-ion battery for 3C applications, automobiles and systems, or defense and space, enabling energy industry manufacturers to use their existing product line of applications with these alternative battery anodes, without any manufacturing bottlenecks.

name: OhmConnect, Inc.
description: Provider of a real-time energy monitoring platform designed to increase energy efficiency. The company's platform monitors real-time conditions on the electricity grid, by receiving notifications to save energy by turning off lights during or by switching off appliances and then pays the consumers for the energy they saved, enabling them to have a positive environmental impact and benefit from the value they've generated.
one_liner: Provider of a real-time energy monitoring platform designed to increase energy efficiency. The company's platform monitors real-time conditions on the electricity grid, by receiving notifications to save energy by turning off lights during or by switching off appliances and then pays the consumers for the energy they saved, enabling them to have a positive environmental impact and benefit from the value they've generated.

name: NanoGrid Technologies, PBC
description: Provider of an online platform intended to offer electrification through software intelligence for electric vehicle owners.The company's platform features centralized intelligence for distributed energy devices through benchmarking, prediction and improved performance, allowing customers to set up their homes to gain cheap, green electricity for their electric vehicle.
one_liner: Provider of an online platform intended to offer electrification through software intelligence for electric vehicle owners.The company's platform features centralized intelligence for distributed energy devices through benchmarking, prediction and improved performance, allowing customers to set up their homes to gain cheap, green electricity for their electric vehicle.
